name: Ball World 3D
description:
Ball World 3D is a 3D adventure/arcade game based on the goal of finding 50 gems across a very large map while avoiding glowing enemies.

Can you find all 50 gems? Put it to the test!

This game features many different places and is still growing. The 50 gems are scattered around these different places:

  • Spawn Area
  • Graveyard
  • Farm
  • Village
  • City
  • Old Ruins
  • Open Settled Fields
  • Tower Defense Area (Blue)
  • Tower Defense Area (Red)

This game features many high quality assets and characters. The main design of the game is in low-poly.

Ball World 3D has been said to be “one of the most relaxing games of all time,” said by many users before launch.

How To Play:

  • WASD or ARROW KEYS to Move
  • SPACE BAR to Jump

Miscellaneous Features:

  • Quality Settings
  • Notifications
  • Feedback System
  • Open Social Media links

Do you have what it takes to find all 50 gems without being caught by glowing enemies? Play Ball World 3D today!
